name: soul-dew
effect: Held by Latias or Latios: Increases the holder’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.
short_effect: Raises Latias and Latios’s Special Attack and Special Defense by 50%.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A wondrous orb to be held by LATIOS or LATIAS. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.platinum: A wondrous orb to be held by LATIOS or LATIAS. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A wondrous orb to be held by LATIOS or LATIAS. It raises both the Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
